channel.title: interviewing on John's Machine Learning and Deep Learning Blog
channel.description: Recent content in interviewing on John's Machine Learning and Deep Learning Blog

item.title: Interview Tips
item.description: As a follow-up to my recent interview-recap on G-Research, I’ve come to some realizations on some general tips for doing well on technical interviews: Don’t procrastinate! Scheduling a coding challenge might feel like scheduling a dentist appointment: why are you willingly scheduling pain for yourself?! But like scheduling a dentist appointment, it is a necessary fact of life. Schedule it soon as you have a relatively free day (I know, I know everyone is always busy!
